name: UROLOGY CARE FOUNDATION
sampleDescriptions: Appropriations for urologic based research, support for patient access legislation and support for veteran health issues

Appropriation funding for Congressionally Directed Medical Research Programs, specifically the prostate, kidney and bladder cancer programs.

Appropriation funding for National Institutes of Health and report language requests for NIH and Health and Human Services. NIH report language centers on early career investigator grant types and HHS
